alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier, eastern Hendry, northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Montura, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Lake Harbor, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
